Description: A market-capitalization-weighted index of 500 leading publicly traded companies in the U.S., representing various sectors of the economy.
A price-weighted index of 30 large, publicly traded companies in the U.S., representing various industries.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of all common stocks listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange, primarily consisting of technology and biotechnology companies.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of all common stocks listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), representing various sectors of the economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of all common stocks listed on the NYSE American stock exchange, representing various sectors of the economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 100 companies listed on the London Stock Exchange (LSE), representing various sectors of the UK economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of 2,000 small-cap companies in the U.S., representing a broad range of industries.
A measure of the market's expectation of volatility over the next 30 days, often referred to as the "fear index."
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 100 companies listed on the London Stock Exchange (LSE), representing various sectors of the UK economy.
A price-weighted index of 30 large, publicly traded companies in Germany, representing various industries.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 40 companies listed on the Euronext Paris stock exchange, representing various sectors of the French economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 50 companies listed on the Euronext stock exchanges, representing various sectors of the European economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 100 companies listed on the Euronext stock exchanges, representing various sectors of the European economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 20 companies listed on the Euronext Brussels stock exchange, representing various sectors of the Belgian economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 50 companies listed on the Moscow Exchange, representing various sectors of the Russian economy.
A price-weighted index of 225 large, publicly traded companies in Japan, representing various industries.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 50 companies listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, representing various sectors of the Hong Kong economy.

A market-capitalization-weighted index of  A-shares and B-shares stocks from large-cap and mid-cap companies listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange, representing various sectors of the Chinese economy.

A market-capitalization-weighted index of companies listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange that tend to be smaller and more focused on technology and manufacturing industries compared to the SSE Composite Index, representing various sectors of the Chinese economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 30 companies listed on the Singapore Exchange, representing various sectors of the Singapore economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 200 companies listed on the Australian Securities Exchange, representing various sectors of the Australian economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of top 500 companies listed on the Australian Securities Exchange (ASX) by market capitalization.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of 30 companies listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) in India, representing various sectors of the Indian economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of all common stocks listed on the Indonesia Stock Exchange (IDX), representing various sectors of the Indonesian economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 30 companies listed on the Bursa Malaysia (formerly Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange), representing various sectors of the Malaysian economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 50 companies listed on the New Zealand Stock Exchange (NZX), representing various sectors of the New Zealand economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of all common stocks listed on the Korea Exchange (KRX), representing various sectors of the South Korean economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of all common stocks listed on the Taiwan Stock Exchange (TSEC), representing various sectors of the Taiwanese economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of all common stocks listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX), representing various sectors of the Canadian economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 50 companies listed on the B3 (formerly BM&FBOVESPA) stock exchange in Brazil, representing various sectors of the Brazilian economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 35 companies listed on the Bolsa Mexicana de Valores (BMV), representing various sectors of the Mexican economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 30 companies listed on the Santiago Stock Exchange (Bolsa de Comercio de Santiago), representing various sectors of the Chilean economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 25 companies listed on the Buenos Aires Stock Exchange (Bolsa de Comercio de Buenos Aires), representing various sectors of the Argentine economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 125 companies listed on the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange (TASE), representing various sectors of the Israeli economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 30 companies listed on the Egyptian Exchange (EGX), representing various sectors of the Egyptian economy.
A market-capitalization-weighted index of the top 40 companies listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE), denominated in U.S. dollars, representing various sectors of the South African economy.
